_header: Saint James apostle of Jesu Christ
Subjects: saints’ lives; James the Greater, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. James the Great (version in short lines)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saynt Iames apostel of ihesu crist& brother of iohn Euangelist…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And so to blis he gan þam bringVnto þat lord be ay loueing
